name: Ciprofloxacin

ingredients.name: SODIUM STARCH GLYCOLATE TYPE A CORN

contraindications.text: ciprofloxacin tablets administered orally described appropriate guidelines tables .

warningsAndPrecautions: ciprofloxacin tablets , usp 250 mg available round , white film-coated tablets debossed “ y101 ” one side . ciprofloxacin tablets , usp 500 mg available oval shaped , white film-coated tablets , debossed “ y102 ” one side . ciprofloxacin tablets , usp 250 mg available bottles 100 , 500 mg available bottles 100 500. bottles 100 strength ndc code tablet identification 250 mg ndc 43547-688-10 y101 500 mg ndc 43547-689-10 y102 bottles 500 500 mg ndc 43547-689-50 y102 store 20° 25°c ( 68° 77°f ) [ usp controlled room temperature ] . preserve well-closed container .
contraindications_original: Ciprofloxacin tablets should be administered orally as described in the appropriate Dosage Guidelines tables.
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Ciprofloxacin Tablets, USP 250 mg are available as round, white film-coated tablets debossed with “Y101” on one side.
                  Ciprofloxacin Tablets, USP 500 mg are available as oval shaped, white film-coated tablets, debossed with “Y102” on one side.
                  Ciprofloxacin Tablets, USP 250 mg are available in bottles of 100, 500 mg are available in bottles of 100 and 500.
